trivia_items.text: His codename derives from a science unit that measures the total quantity of visible light.
Lumen has the traits of a blue guppy (Poecilia reticulata). A school of the said fish is present in his Elite 2 artwork.

sub_items: He is the first male 6★ Medic and third male Medic after Ansel and Chestnut.
He is the first post-release 6★ Medic; Kal'tsit is excluded as she was an Operator since the closed beta of Arknights.
He is the second 6★ welfare Operator after Gladiia.

trivia_items.text: Lumen is currently the only Therapist Medic (and Operator, in that matter) who's capable of removing Negative Statuses entirely, making him a valuable Operator in more difficult contents.

Because of his real name, KR server players joked that he reminds them of a Kakao Friends mascot with the similar name. This proved to be quite a popular meme as several fanarts depicting Lumen in the form of said mascot were drawn and even attracted some new Arknights players.
Lumen's Chinese CV, Sun Ye/Gary, is known for singing "Oath" for A Post Honkai Odyssey.
